title: Ed Koch
deleted: Shortly before he died in 2009, former New York City senior assistant corporation counsel [[Dennis deLeon]] accused Koch of [[sexual harassment]] during a visit to Koch's apartment. Koch "dismissed the story mockingly" in a conversation with journalist Andy Humm in 2011.<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.gaycitynews.com/ed-koch-12-years-as-mayor-a-lifetime-in-the-closet/|title=Ed Koch: 12 Years as Mayor, A Lifetime in the Closet|date=February 3, 2013|website=Gay City News}}</ref>
